header:
# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

sections.name: Added
items: [APP-1048: Add ability to assign volunteer to multiple recurring events](https://circleof.atlassian.net/browse/APP-1048)

sections.name: Fixed
items: [APP-1182: [Admin Pages] Editing images for already created company doesn't work](https://circleof.atlassian.net/browse/APP-1182)

sections.name: Added
items: [APP-300: Infosec:  Encrypt sensitive information or PII  phone](https://circleof.atlassian.net/browse/APP-300)
[APP-742: Add ability to leave team for FnF role](https://circleof.atlassian.net/browse/APP-742)
[APP-890: [Public Teams] Add a home screen card to encourage a visit to organizational team](https://circleof.atlassian.net/browse/APP-890)
[PLAT-193: Post created notifications. Add In-app notification component](https://circleof.atlassian.net/browse/PLAT-193)

sections.name: Fixed
items: [APP-972: [Multiple Volunteers] iPhone 8: After swiping on a task the "Unassign Volunteer" it barely fits](https://circleof.atlassian.net/browse/APP-972)
[APP-1079: [Inactivity Problem] Token expires if user haven't used the app for a while, but app is unaware and it hangs/doesn't function](https://circleof.atlassian.net/browse/APP-1079)
